entries.name: add_protocol(prot)
entries.desc: Add a new protocol to the DRbProtocol module.

entries.name: open(uri, config, first=true)
entries.desc: Open a client connection to uri with the configuration config.

entries.name: open_server(uri, config, first=true)
entries.desc: Open a server listening for connections at uri with configuration config.

entries.name: uri_option(uri, config, first=true)
entries.desc: Parse uri into a [uri, option] pair.
